title: Sidewall, ca. 1820
creditline: Gift of The Museum at The Fashion Institute of Technology
description: Green flocked alternating with wider white band. Repeating motif of stylized three-petal foliage. Green flock is overprinted with darker green. Printed in green flock and gray on white satin ground.

participants.person_name: The Museum at The Fashion Institute of Technology

tombstone.epitaph: Sidewall, ca. 1820.Block-printed and flocked. Gift of The Museum at The Fashion Institute of Technology. 1998-75-220.
